20110116060106.000|20110116060107.000|CC1|THOSE TWO GIRLS.

20110116060109.000|20110116060111.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN A RELATIONSHIP.     
20110116060111.000|20110116060113.000|CC1|LEISA HURST BELIEVED THAT JEAMI 
20110116060113.000|20110116060115.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS WAS A GREAT GUY AND   
20110116060115.000|20110116060117.000|CC1|THAT HE'D FALLEN IN LOVE WITH

20110116060125.000|20110116060127.000|CC1|WAS A COMBAT VETERAN IN BOTH

20110116063004.000|20110116063005.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOUR DAYS INTO THE 
20110116063005.000|20110116063007.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION OF LEISA HURST'S  
20110116063007.000|20110116063010.000|CC1|DISAPPEARANCE, DETECTIVE KEITH  
20110116063010.000|20110116063012.000|CC1|LIBBY KNEW HE HAD HIS MAN, JEAMI
20110116063012.000|20110116063014.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS, AND SO DID LEISA'S   
20110116063014.000|20110116063015.000|CC1|MOTHER.                         
20110116063015.000|20110116063016.000|CC1|>> IN MY GUT I KIND OF FELT IT  
20110116063016.000|20110116063017.000|CC1|WAS JEAMI.                      
20110116063017.000|20110116063020.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT EVEN WITH THE  
20110116063020.000|20110116063021.000|CC1|DISCOVERY OF CHIAPULIS' MARRIAGE
20110116063021.000|20110116063023.000|CC1|AND THE RECEIPTS SHOWING HIS    
20110116063023.000|20110116063024.000|CC1|PURCHASES FOR DUCT TAPE, GLOVES,
20110116063024.000|20110116063027.000|CC1|A PICK AXE, AND SHOVEL...       
20110116063027.000|20110116063029.000|CC1|>> GO AHEAD!                    
20110116063029.000|20110116063030.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ...THERE WAS STILL 
20110116063030.000|20110116063033.000|CC1|NO BODY.                        
20110116063033.000|20110116063033.000|CC1|>> I WAS THINKING DEFINITELY    
20110116063033.000|20110116063035.000|CC1|FOUL PLAY.                      
20110116063035.000|20110116063035.000|CC1|I WAS THINKING HE COULD HAVE    
20110116063035.000|20110116063038.000|CC1|KILLED HER.                     
20110116063038.000|20110116063039.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DESPERATE FOR      
20110116063039.000|20110116063041.000|CC1|ANSWERS, THEY FOCUSED ON THE    
20110116063041.000|20110116063042.000|CC1|WOMAN CHIAPULIS TOLD POLICE HE  
20110116063042.000|20110116063043.000|CC1|WAS WITH THE NIGHT LEISA        
20110116063043.000|20110116063045.000|CC1|DISAPPEARED.                    
20110116063045.000|20110116063046.000|CC1|>> I DIDN'T THINK THERE WAS     
20110116063046.000|20110116063047.000|CC1|ANYONE ELSE.                    
20110116063047.000|20110116063048.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LIKE LEISA HURST,  
20110116063048.000|20110116063049.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS HAD PROMISED TO MARRY 
20110116063049.000|20110116063051.000|CC1|JOYCE.                          
20110116063051.000|20110116063052.000|CC1|>> HE TOLD ME THAT WAS HIS      
20110116063052.000|20110116063054.000|CC1|HEART'S DESIRE.                 
20110116063054.000|20110116063055.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THAT IS NOT    
20110116063055.000|20110116063057.000|CC1|WHAT JOYCE TOLD DETECTIVE LIBBY 
20110116063057.000|20110116063058.000|CC1|WHEN HE INTERVIEWED HER JUST    
20110116063058.000|20110116063059.000|CC1|FOUR DAYS AFTER LEISA           
20110116063059.000|20110116063102.000|CC1|DISAPPEARED.                    
20110116063102.000|20110116063103.000|CC1|>> SHE SAID SHE KNEW JEAMI BUT  
20110116063103.000|20110116063105.000|CC1|HADN'T SEEN HIM IN OVER A YEAR. 
20110116063105.000|20110116063107.000|CC1|IT TOOK MY POINTING OUT TO HER  
20110116063107.000|20110116063111.000|CC1|THAT WE FOUND A CONDOM AND IT   
20110116063111.000|20110116063112.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE HER DNA EVIDENCE ON  
20110116063112.000|20110116063113.000|CC1|IT FOR HER TO SAY, "OKAY, I WAS 
20110116063113.000|20110116063114.000|CC1|THERE THURSDAY NIGHT AND I HAD  
20110116063114.000|20110116063115.000|CC1|SEX WITH HIM."                  
20110116063115.000|20110116063116.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THAT WAS ALL JOYCE 
20110116063116.000|20110116063117.000|CC1|TOLD POLICE.                    
20110116063117.000|20110116063119.000|CC1|SHE FAILED TO MENTION THE NIGHT 
20110116063119.000|20110116063121.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS CALLED HER IN A PANIC 
20110116063121.000|20110116063122.000|CC1|WITH AN ODD REQUEST-- COULD SHE 
20110116063122.000|20110116063125.000|CC1|HELP HIM GET RID OF A CAR?      
20110116063125.000|20110116063127.000|CC1|IT ALSO HAPPENED TO BE THE VERY 
20110116063127.000|20110116063128.000|CC1|SAME NIGHT LEISA HURST WENT     
20110116063128.000|20110116063130.000|CC1|MISSING.                        
20110116063130.000|20110116063132.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS SAID HE NEEDED TO HELP
20110116063132.000|20110116063133.000|CC1|A FRIEND WHO HAD FALLEN BEHIND  
20110116063133.000|20110116063135.000|CC1|ON CAR PAYMENTS.                
20110116063135.000|20110116063137.000|CC1|HE NEEDED SOME PLACE TO DUMP THE
20110116063137.000|20110116063138.000|CC1|CAR, SO IT WOULD APPEAR THAT IT 
20110116063138.000|20110116063140.000|CC1|HAD BEEN STOLEN.                
20110116063140.000|20110116063141.000|CC1|>> I NEVER HAD A REASON TO      
20110116063141.000|20110116063144.000|CC1|DISTRUST HIM.                   
20110116063144.000|20110116063145.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JOYCE HAD CHIAPULIS
20110116063145.000|20110116063147.000|CC1|FOLLOW HER HERE TO THE TOWN OF  
20110116063147.000|20110116063149.000|CC1|HESPERIA, TO A NEIGHBORHOOD THAT
20110116063149.000|20110116063150.000|CC1|SHE SAID HAD A BAD REPUTATION   
20110116063150.000|20110116063153.000|CC1|FOR CRIME.                      
20110116063153.000|20110116063154.000|CC1|THEY LEFT THE CAR RIGHT HERE ON 
20110116063154.000|20110116063156.000|CC1|THIS ROADWAY, WITH THE WINDOWS  
20110116063156.000|20110116063158.000|CC1|ROLLED DOWN, AND THE KEY IN THE 
20110116063158.000|20110116063200.000|CC1|IGNITION.                       
20110116063200.000|20110116063201.000|CC1|AFTER THEY DITCHED LEISA'S CAR, 
20110116063201.000|20110116063203.000|CC1|THE TWO THEN DROVE BACK TO      
20110116063203.000|20110116063205.000|CC1|JEAMI'S HOUSE, WHERE THEY HAD

20110116063213.000|20110116063215.000|CC1|>> HE TOLD ME THAT HE HAD FAMILY
20110116063215.000|20110116063218.000|CC1|IN THE MAFIA, AND THEY HAD      
20110116063218.000|20110116063221.000|CC1|RECENTLY DELIVERED HIM A

20110116063227.000|20110116063230.000|CC1|TRASH CAN WITH DUCT TAPE.       
20110116063230.000|20110116063235.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO NOW, JUST HOURS

20110116063257.000|20110116063259.000|CC1|>> NO.

20110116063345.000|20110116063348.000|CC1|>> EVERYTHING CROSSED MY MIND.

20110116063403.000|20110116063404.000|CC1|>> I PANICKED.                  
20110116063404.000|20110116063406.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND WITH NO        
20110116063406.000|20110116063407.000|CC1|PHYSICAL EVIDENCE TO TIE        
20110116063407.000|20110116063410.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS DIRECTLY TO LEISA'S   
20110116063410.000|20110116063410.000|CC1|DISAPPEARANCE, THE INVESTIGATION
20110116063410.000|20110116063413.000|CC1|CAME TO A HALT.                 
20110116063413.000|20110116063414.000|CC1|>> WE WEREN'T GETTING ANYWHERE. 
20110116063414.000|20110116063416.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT LIBBY WAS ABOUT
20110116063416.000|20110116063418.000|CC1|TO GET HELP FROM AN UNLIKELY    
20110116063418.000|20110116063422.000|CC1|INVESTIGATOR, LEISA'S BROTHER,  
20110116063422.000|20110116063423.000|CC1|VALDEN, WHO HAD GONE TO HESPERIA
20110116063423.000|20110116063424.000|CC1|LOOKING FOR HIS SISTER JUST     
20110116063424.000|20110116063425.000|CC1|HOURS AFTER THEY DISCOVERED SHE 
20110116063425.000|20110116063427.000|CC1|WAS MISSING.                    
20110116063427.000|20110116063430.000|CC1|>> VALDEN HAD RECOVERED A PAIR  
20110116063430.000|20110116063433.000|CC1|OF ORANGE RUBBER GLOVES AND A   
20110116063433.000|20110116063434.000|CC1|PLASTIC SHOWER CAP.             
20110116063434.000|20110116063436.000|CC1|THEY WERE LAYING IN THE ROADWAY 
20110116063436.000|20110116063437.000|CC1|THERE, AND THE IMPORTANT THING  
20110116063437.000|20110116063439.000|CC1|HE DID WAS HE TOOK A PHOTOGRAPH 
20110116063439.000|20110116063441.000|CC1|OF THEM, A NICE, CLEAR, DIGITAL 
20110116063441.000|20110116063443.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPH, WHICH SHOWED THE    
20110116063443.000|20110116063445.000|CC1|CONDITION THAT THEY WERE FOUND, 
20110116063445.000|20110116063446.000|CC1|WHETHER IT WAS INTENTIONAL OR   
20110116063446.000|20110116063447.000|CC1|OTHERWISE, HE NEVER MENTIONED TO
20110116063447.000|20110116063448.000|CC1|JEAMI CHIAPULIS THAT HE TOOK THE
20110116063448.000|20110116063449.000|CC1|PHOTO.                          
20110116063449.000|20110116063450.000|CC1|>> Reporter: VALDEN HANDED THE  
20110116063450.000|20110116063453.000|CC1|CAP AND GLOVES OVER TO          
20110116063453.000|20110116063454.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS, AND CHIAPULIS WOULD  
20110116063454.000|20110116063456.000|CC1|TURN THEM OVER TO POLICE, FIVE  
20110116063456.000|20110116063459.000|CC1|HOURS LATER.                    
20110116063459.000|20110116063500.000|CC1|IT WOULDN'T TAKE LONG FOR THE   
20110116063500.000|20110116063501.000|CC1|DETECTIVE TO MAKE A STARTLING   
20110116063501.000|20110116063503.000|CC1|DISCOVERY.                      
20110116063503.000|20110116063504.000|CC1|>> I SAID, "HE SWITCHED THESE   
20110116063504.000|20110116063506.000|CC1|AROUND."                        
20110116063506.000|20110116063508.000|CC1|>> CHIAPULIS HAD ACTUALLY GIVEN 
20110116063508.000|20110116063510.000|CC1|POLICE A DIFFERENT PAIR OF      
20110116063510.000|20110116063511.000|CC1|GLOVES AND A DIFFERENT COLORED  
20110116063511.000|20110116063513.000|CC1|CAP.                            
20110116063513.000|20110116063515.000|CC1|BUT WHY?                        
20110116063515.000|20110116063518.000|CC1|>> HE HAD DONE SOMETHING TO TRY 
20110116063518.000|20110116063519.000|CC1|TO AVOID DETECTION WHILE DRIVING
20110116063519.000|20110116063521.000|CC1|THE CAR AND THEN TRY TO AVOID   
20110116063521.000|20110116063522.000|CC1|PROSECUTION BY DESTROYING THE   
20110116063522.000|20110116063524.000|CC1|EVIDENCE.                       
20110116063524.000|20110116063525.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND WITH THAT, A   
20110116063525.000|20110116063526.000|CC1|CRITICAL PIECE OF THE PUZZLE    
20110116063526.000|20110116063527.000|CC1|FELL INTO PLACE.                
20110116063527.000|20110116063529.000|CC1|THE HOME DEPOT RECEIPTS AND     
20110116063529.000|20110116063532.000|CC1|CHIAPULIS' BIZARRE DOUBLE LIFE. 
20110116063532.000|20110116063534.000|CC1|NOW, DETECTIVE LIBBY FELT HE    
20110116063534.000|20110116063535.000|CC1|COULD MAKE A STRONG CASE AGAINST
20110116063535.000|20110116063538.000|CC1|JEAMI CHIAPULIS.                
20110116063538.000|20110116063539.000|CC1|>> WE, OBVIOUSLY, KNEW THAT     
20110116063539.000|20110116063540.000|CC1|THERE WERE GOING TO BE SOME     
20110116063540.000|20110116063542.000|CC1|CHALLENGES WITHOUT HER BODY.    
20110116063542.000|20110116063543.000|CC1|HOWEVER, WE WERE CONFIDENT THAT 
20110116063543.000|20110116063544.000|CC1|WE HAD A GOOD CASE,             
20110116063544.000|20110116063546.000|CC1|CIRCUMSTANTIALLY.               
20110116063546.000|20110116063547.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LIBBY WOULD GET NO 
20110116063547.000|20110116063549.000|CC1|HELP FROM CHIAPULIS, WHO WAS NO 
20110116063549.000|20110116063551.000|CC1|LONGER TALKING BECAUSE HE HAD   
20110116063551.000|20110116063552.000|CC1|COMMITTED HIMSELF TO A LOCAL    
20110116063552.000|20110116063556.000|CC1|PSYCHIATRIC WARD.               
20110116063556.000|20110116063557.000|CC1|>> HE'S PROBABLY TRY TO BUY TIME
20110116063557.000|20110116063558.000|CC1|TO SET IT UP AS AN INSANITY     
20110116063558.000|20110116063602.000|CC1|DEFENSE.                        
20110116063602.000|20110116063604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THREE WEEKS AFTER  
20110116063604.000|20110116063606.000|CC1|LEISA HURST DISAPPEARED, ON THE 
20110116063606.000|20110116063607.000|CC1|SAME DAY CHIAPULIS CHECKED OUT  
20110116063607.000|20110116063609.000|CC1|OF THE MENTAL WARD, AND INTO    
20110116063609.000|20110116063613.000|CC1|THIS MOTEL, POLICE MOVED IN.
